channel.title: Google Summer of Code on Eclipse SW360
channel.description: Recent content in Google Summer of Code on Eclipse SW360

item.title: AI Policy
item.description:
AI Policy

Starting 2026, Google has strong advice about the usage of Generative AI in the GSoC program. Please check them at:

  • For Mentoring Orgs: Usage of AI tooling in Google Summer of Code 2026 (for Mentoring Orgs)
  • For Contributors: Guidance for GSoC Contributors using AI tooling in GSoC 2026 doc

Based on the suggestions from Google, SW360 has the following guidelines for GSoC contributors:

item.title: GSoC Idea List - 2026
item.description:
GSoC Idea List - 2026

Welcome to the idea page for all GSoC 2026 related information.

  • Check https://github.com/eclipse-sw360/sw360/discussions/3631

Intro

SW360 is applying as a mentoring org again in GSoC 2026 with the ambition to make it as awesome as the GSoC 2025!

Please see two main resources for finding out more SW360 in general:

  • Check https://eclipse.dev/sw360/ and development and deployment section.
  • Try to install SW360 from source or your can try the Docker

Meetings: Checkout the Meetings table

item.title: GSoC Idea List - 2025
item.description:
GSoC Idea List - 2025

Welcome to the idea page for all GSoC 2025 related information.

  • Check https://github.com/eclipse-sw360/sw360/discussions/2868

Intro

SW360 project has been selected as a mentoring Org with GSoC 2025. Thank you, Google!

Please see two main resources for finding out more SW360 in general:

  • Check https://eclipse.dev/sw360/ and development and deployment section.
  • Try to install SW360 from source or your can try the Docker

Meetings: Checkout the Meetings table
